text: L'Île-Rousse () is a commune in the Haute-Corse department of Corsica, France. It has a permanent population of around 2,500. It was founded in 1758 by Pasquale Paoli to create a port that would not be in the hands of the Genoese like Calvi. == Famous people born in the city == * Pascal Paoli == Other websites == * Map of L'Île-Rousse on Mapquest In French: * L'Île-Rousse on the site of the Institut Géographique National * L'Île-Rousse on the site of INSEE Category:Communes in Haute-Corse Category:1758 establishments Category:1750s establishments in Europe Category:18th-century establishments in France
title: L'Île-Rousse
